author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Watching again that guerrilla stream before that Uparupa's 2nd Anniversary, first with Peko-chan's 2nd Anniversary at 17th and Rushia's 2nd Anniversary at following day, it was the best of the best...
So, the Original Rushia was designed to be quiet, but also comically yandere if someone goes to watch another girl... Now Rushia became more menhera (Emotionally Unstable) than the one planned by Hololive and Yasuyuki-sensei.
But her menhera level started since December 2019 (Raging too much, making drama, crying and various emotions) and now it became her great attraction.

Otherwise, if she would continue to being seiso but quiet, she would not to be recognized today.

From that compilation, she jumped some moments like that February 2020 or March 2020 when LiveChat proposed Marriage to her. Maybe at that moment she was stopping to use her yandere face and became emotionally unstable (Next level of menhera)
Later at 2020 June 5th she became more closer to audience and starting 2020 September 6th, she became more lovely than before... Like... Wow, it hasn't words to describe that.

At 2020 December 30th and personally talking, I started to watch her from another thinking... Well, another point view.
She has too many potential... Singing, making ASMR, cooking, gaming... Always with more passion than before. Rushia born to be a dedicated entertainer.

Uruha Rushia, a Necromancer from Makai World which she doesn't like to be alone. She also became a princess.
At 2021 March 3rd, she reached the Million Subscribers Milestone. I remember that stream, when starting second song ("Kingyo Hanabi") she was surprised and became too emotioned until tears trying to sing. Various holomembers who reached that milestone until today were emotioned, but Rushia was the special case being more emotioned.

Rushia deserves more love, since she's the entire LiveChat's girlfriend. Also she seems like an obscure character, but she's an Angel inside.

とっても素敵なゲリラ配信でした…るーちゃんの素敵な所がこれでもかと詰まった豪華配信！！
18日も絶対みます！！！:_きゅん::_ハート::_ハート:

author: デージマ　ディエゴ
text:
凄いよかったです！仕事終わってからのるーちゃんは最高でした
44:44 ここがね今年一笑いました

author: ぽいまる
text:
おつるしでした
ホラーでもるしあちゃんの可愛さが結局塗りつぶされて可愛さしかのこらんのよな。
３Ｄライブ絶対見るね大好きだよ！❤️
